required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Gastric Cancer Liver Metastasis Cohort of China
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Multi-institutional Cohort Study of Gastric Cancer Liver Metastasis in Real-world Data of China

brief_summary.textblock: This multi-institutional retrospective cohort study aimed to describe and analyze the overall clinical characteristics, therapeutic status and prognosis pattern of gastric cancer liver metastasis (GCLM) in China.

primary_outcome.description: The proportion (%) of gastric cancer liver metastasis patients that survived beyond one-year follow-up period.
The proportion (%) of gastric cancer liver metastasis patients that survived beyond three-year follow-up period.
The proportion (%) of gastric cancer liver metastasis patients that survived beyond five-year follow-up period.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of gastric cancer liver metastasis cases
secondary_outcome.description: The rate of gastric cancer liver metastasis cases divided by all gastric cancer cases in the study period.

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion for synchronous and metachronous liver metastases cases
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion (%) of synchronous or metachronous gastric cancer liver metastases cases in all gastric cancer cases

secondary_outcome.measure: The survival of patients that recieved different therapeutic methods
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion (%) of patients under different therapies that survived beyond specific follow-up period.

secondary_outcome.measure: The prognostic predictive value for patients with different C-GCLM classification
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion (%) of patients of different classification that survived beyond specific follow-up period.

study_pop.textblock: All eligible in-hospital gastric cancer liver metastases cases.

facility.name: General Surgery Institute, China PLA General Hospital

reference.citation: Zhang K, Chen L. Chinese consensus on the diagnosis and treatment of gastric cancer with liver metastases. Ther Adv Med Oncol. 2020 Feb 20;12:1758835920904803. doi: 10.1177/1758835920904803. eCollection 2020.
